messages.say:
File: Claude-AI Dashboard Backend Components.json
File: Claude-Next.js AI Landing Page Security (1).json

Take in consideration that this app will be accessible to paying customers via the landing page described in the md file attached.

Looking at the backend API structure and dashboard components you've provided, I see a comprehensive system for managing AI Sheets usage. However, there are several critical issues that need to be addressed before launching to paying customers:


Critical Security Issues


1. Authentication Implementation Gap
The backend structure includes authentication functions, but they're incomplete:


Password hashing is commented out in the authentication code

No actual password verification implementation

JWT handling exists but lacks proper secret validation


2. API Key Security Concerns


// Current implementation exposes sensitive operations
export function generateApiKey(): { key: string; hash: string; preview: string } {
  const key = `sk_${crypto.randomBytes(24).toString('hex')}`
  // This needs rate limiting and proper validation
}


3. Database Transaction Safety
The credit deduction logic needs atomic transactions:


// Risky: Multiple database operations without transaction safety
await getCurrentCreditBalance(userId);
await db.creditLedger.create({...});


Production Readiness Issues


1. Missing Rate Limiting
Your AI function endpoints lack protection against abuse:


No per-user rate limiting

No API key usage quotas

No suspicious pattern detection


2. Incomplete Error Recovery
The webhook system has basic idempotency but lacks:


Proper retry logic for failed AI function calls

Dead letter queue for failed payments

Audit trail for support investigations


3. Monitoring and Alerting
No observability for production issues:


No health check endpoints

No performance metrics collection

No alerting for critical failures


Recommendations for Production Launch


Immediate (Pre-Launch)


Implement proper password hashing with bcrypt

Add comprehensive input validation to all API endpoints

Set up database connection pooling and timeout handling

Create proper error boundaries in React components


Short-term (Week 1)


Add rate limiting middleware using libraries like @upstash/ratelimit

Implement proper database transactions for credit operations

Set up monitoring with services like Sentry or LogRocket

Create admin dashboard for customer support


Medium-term (Month 1)


Add advanced usage analytics and forecasting

Implement automated fraud detection

Set up proper backup and disaster recovery

Add comprehensive API documentation


The current codebase is well-structured but needs these security and reliability improvements before handling paying customers. The foundation is solid, but production deployment requires addressing these operational concerns.
ok

Is there a specific aspect of the dashboard backend or security implementation you'd like me to focus on next? I can help with:


Implementing the missing authentication components

Creating the rate limiting middleware

Setting up proper database transactions

Building the admin dashboard for customer support

Adding monitoring and health check endpoints


Or if you have other questions about the AI Sheets project, let me know what you'd like to work on.

Implementing the missing authentication components

Creating the rate limiting middleware

Setting up proper database transactions

Building the admin dashboard for customer support

Adding monitoring and health check endpoints

Update : Sheets GPT functions (the formula API)


Core set: GPT, GPT_LIST/HLIST, GPT_TABLE, GPT_SUMMARIZE, GPT_EDIT, GPT_EXTRACT, GPT_CLASSIFY, GPT_TRANSLATE, GPT_FORMAT, GPT_SPLIT/HSPLIT, GPT_VISION, helper GPT_CREATE_PROMPT, and GPT_MATCH (uses embeddings; ~1k rows limit). GPT for Work

Caching: 30-day encrypted cache (Sheets formulas) to avoid re-compute on auto-recalcs; safe mode to paste values. GPT for Work

Bulk tools (Sheets/Excel sidebar)


Tools: Custom Prompt, Translate, Classify/Categorize, Extract, Reformat, Search the web, Prompt images (Vision). Progress tracker, history reuse (90 days), per-run custom instructions; sources column when using web-search models. Multiple image columns (up to 5) supported. GPT for Work+2GPT for Work+2
Web search & scraping

Web search uses Perplexity Sonar/Gemini with options: domain targeting (up to 3), recency windows, context size tiers; can show source URLs. GPT for Work

Scrape script (Apps Script) provided to pull page text into cells; limits ~50k chars. (Free/not billed to packs). GPT for Work
Rate limits / scale expectations

120 rpm (formulas), 360 rpm (bulk); hundreds of thousands of rows messaging; Excel page claims per-hour/day tallies. GPT for Work
Security, privacy, & pricing posture

ISO 27001, GDPR, GCP hosting; SSO with Google/Microsoft. Zero-retention if user brings their own API keys; if not, inputs/outputs may be stored 30 days (support) and up to 1 year for product improvement; Sheets cache: 30 days. GPT for Work

Pricing: prepaid packs vs. enterprise subscription; BYO key optional/required depending on plan. Custom endpoints free for individual use; contact for professional use. GPT for Work

reate a provider adapter layer with a single generate() / embed() interface handling OpenAI, Anthropic, Gemini, Perplexity, OpenRouter, DeepSeek, xAI, Mistral, and OpenAI-compatible custom endpoints (incl. Azure/Ollama). Add auth for user API keys (KMS-encrypted at rest), plus space-level keys you own. Mirror GPTFWs models you can use with/without API key. GPT for Work

Jobs & throttling: Redis queue + workers; adaptive rate-limiters per provider; targets: 120 rpm (formula path), 360 rpm (bulk path) with backoff. GPT for Work

Web search & scraping


Web search uses Perplexity Sonar/Gemini with options: domain targeting (up to 3), recency windows, context size tiers; can show source URLs. GPT for Work

Scrape script (Apps Script) provided to pull page text into cells; limits ~50k chars. (Free/not billed to packs). GPT for Work
Rate limits / scale expectations

120 rpm (formulas), 360 rpm (bulk); hundreds of thousands of rows messaging; Excel page claims per-hour/day tallies. GPT for Work
Security, privacy, & pricing posture

ISO 27001, GDPR, GCP hosting; SSO with Google/Microsoft. Zero-retention if user brings their own API keys; if not, inputs/outputs may be stored 30 days (support) and up to 1 year for product improvement; Sheets cache: 30 days. GPT for Work

Pricing: prepaid packs vs. enterprise subscription; BYO key optional/required depending on plan. Custom endpoints free for individual use; contact for professional use. GPT for Work

Foundation & one interface to many models


Backend: Node (NestJS) or Python (FastAPI). Create a provider adapter layer with a single generate() / embed() interface handling OpenAI, Anthropic, Gemini, Perplexity, OpenRouter, DeepSeek, xAI, Mistral, and OpenAI-compatible custom endpoints (incl. Azure/Ollama). Add auth for user API keys (KMS-encrypted at rest), plus space-level keys you own. Mirror GPTFWs models you can use with/without API key. GPT for Work

Jobs & throttling: Redis queue + workers; adaptive rate-limiters per provider; targets: 120 rpm (formula path), 360 rpm (bulk path) with backoff. GPT for Work


Google Sheets add-on (must-have MVP)


Add-on shell: Google Apps Script Add-on (CardService) launching a webapp sidebar (HTML/CSS/TS) that talks to your backend.

Custom functions: Implement the set shown above (GPT, GPT_EDIT, , GPT_VISION, GPT_MATCH). Functions call your backend via UrlFetchApp.
Caching: 30-day cache keyed by (formulaText, inputs, model, temperature, userId); store encrypted; toggle paste values on compute for a safe mode. (Matches their behavior.) GPT for Work

GPT_MATCH: use embeddings endpoint (OpenAI or alt), cap ~1k rows per call as they do; offer confidence/top-k outputs. GPT for Work

Bulk tools: Sidebar flows for Custom, Translate, Classify, Extract, Reformat, Vision (+ Search the web) with:
Column pickers, result column, history save/reuse for 90 days, progress & pause/stop, per-run instructions, sources column for web search. GPT for Work+2GPT for Work+2

Vision: allow up to 5 image URL columns per run. GPT for Work

Web search: wire Perplexity Sonar (domain & recency filters), Gemini with web search toggle; show sources next to outputs. GPT for Work

Scraper: ship an Apps Script snippet to import page text to cells (cap text length ~50k). Mark as not billed to packs. GPT for Work

Formula assistant: small LLM tool to generate/explain formulas in a Sheets sidebar view. GPT for Work

Model switcher, API keys, and custom endpoints


Model switcher with provider tabs, flags for vision, reasoning, web-search, and price/tooltips.

BYO keys: user-level secrets (enclave/KMS) with zero retention mode (dont log inputs/outputs if key present). If no key, follow a 30-day support log + 1-year product improvement window like they state (or do stricter). GPT for Work

Custom endpoints: allow adding OpenAI-compatible base URL, optional API key, name; support Azure OpenAI patterns and Ollama (local). Provide endpoint health check. GPT for Work+1

) Billing & usage


Prepaid packs (Stripe): track tokens at providers pricing; show balance in sidebar; pause/resume per space. Offer enterprise subscription (per-seat, unlimited tokens) as an upsell. GPT for Work

Add an OpenAI pricing calculator-style estimator page for transparency. GPT for Work


Teams, spaces, and admin


Spaces with roles (owner/admin/member), transfer ownership, allow/disallow member BYO keys & custom endpoints, share purchased packs. Provide run history (90 days) reuse. GPT for Work


Compliance & security


SSO via Google/Microsoft, least-privilege scopes (explain why bulk tools needs broader Sheets scopetheres no per-file scope), KMS everywhere, TLS 1.2/1.3 only, US-central GCP or your region. Publish Security & Privacy FAQ mirroring theirs for enterprise trust.
